content.question: Propose a refinement to the initial experimental design that will rule out the possibility that preference is based on a visual cue. Propose a different refinement to the initial experiment to test whether sulcatone is the attractant for the human-preferring form.

frqParts.text: Propose a refinement to the initial experimental design that will rule out the possibility that preference is based on a visual cue. Propose a different refinement to the initial experiment to test whether sulcatone is the attractant for the human-preferring form.

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
